title: Real estate stocks fall on IT sector worries; Nifty Realty index down 1.5%, ‘Best is behind us’, says expert
description: The sell-off in realty shares comes alongside a sharp decline in IT stocks, which have been hit by fears of artificial intelligence-led disruption after recent claims by Anthropic on automating legacy software modernisation.
content: Real estate stocks came under pressure around noon on Tuesday, tracking broader weakness in equity markets as mounting uncertainty around the IT sector weighed on sentiment. The Nifty Realty index fell 1.42 percent, with all 10 constituents trading i... [2455 chars]

title: New Delhi declaration on AI Impact signatories reach 91 as three more nations join
description: The global consensus on artificial intelligence governance expanded as three additional nations joined the New Delhi Declaration on AI Impact, bringing the total number of signatories to 91 countries and international organisations.

title: Are China’s ‘AI tigers’ cheating? US rival Anthropic alleges some are
description: By John Liu, CNN (CNN) — United States artificial intelligence firm Anthropic is accusing three prominent Chinese AI labs of illegally extracting capabilities from its Claude model to advance their own, claiming it raises national security concerns. title: Possible AI use leads to end of senryu competition after 20 years
description: The organizers decided to end the contest as it has become difficult for the works to be judged fairly given the emergence of artificial intelligence.
content:
An annual contest for senryu, or traditional Japanese short poetry, in Tottori Prefecture came to an end this month after 20 years due to suspicion some of the participants might have used artificial intelligence for their submissions.

title: Hackers used AI to breach 600 firewalls in weeks, Amazon says
description: Over the last five weeks, a limited number of hackers broke into more than 600 firewalls across dozens of countries with the help of widely available artificial intelligence tools, according to security research from Amazon.com Inc.
content:

title: Hegseth and Anthropic CEO set to meet as debate intensifies over the military's use of AI
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth plans to meet Tuesday with the CEO of Anthropic, with the artificial intelligence company the only one of its peers to not supply its technology to a new US military internal network.
